movies.title: Guardians of the galaxy
movies.synopsis: Ager stealing a mysterious orb in the far reaches of outer space, Peter Quill from Earth, is now the main target of a manhunt led by the villain known as Ronan the Acusser. To help fight Ronan and his team and save the galaxy from his power, Quill creates a team of space heroes known as 'Guardians of the Galaxy' to save the world.
movies.cast: Chriss Pratt, Zoe Saldana, Dave Bautista, Vin Diesel, Bradley Cooper and others...
movies.writters: James Gunn, Nicole Pertman, Dan Abnett, Andy Lanning

movies.title: Captain America: The Winter Soldier
movies.synopsis: As Steve Rogers struggles to embrace his role in the modern world, he teams up with another super soldier, the black widow, to battle a new threat from old history: an assassin known as the Winter Soldier.
movies.cast: Chris Evans, Samuel L. Jackson, Scarlett Johansson and others...

movies.title: Thor: The Dark World
movies.synopsis: When Dr Jane Foster gets cursed with a powerful object, Thor must protect it before an army and its ruthless leader try to get their hands on it to take over the remains of Earth.
movies.cast: Chris Hemsworth, Natalie Portman, Tom Hiddleston and others...

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.synopsis: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity
movies.cast: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson and others...
